alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 2:07PM EDT until July 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Sullivan. * WHEN...Until 715 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 206 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Monticello, Fallsburg, Bethel, South Fallsburg, Cochecton, Wurtsboro, Woodridge, Bloomingburg, Maplewood, Mongaup Valley, Smallwood, White Lake, Hartwood, Harris, Kiamesha, Thompsonville, Hurleyville, Oakland, Highland Lake and Glen Spey. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
